description:
"Construction of roof extensions at fourth, sixth and seventh floors; installation of roof top plant; formation of new roof top terraces at fourth, fifth, sixth and seventh floors; alterations to the front steps fronting Finsbury Square; formation of new cycle entrances to Lackington Street; landscaping to internal courtyards; change of use (86 sq.m GIA) to flexible office/retail (Class B1(a)/A1) at ground floor level on Lackington Street; and other ancillary and associated works"

Section 73 to vary Condition 2 (Drawing and Document Numbers), Condition 3 (materials) and Condition 5 (Construction Environment Management Plan) of planning permission ref: P2019/0550/FUL dated 15/05/2019. Revisions include: 
Condition 2 - creation of external amenity terrace at 6th floor level of Lackington Building;
- new curtain glazing to 6th floor level rear of Finsbury Building; and
- alterations to 7th floor office roof profile to Finsbury Building. appearance of plant enclosures, curtain walling, size and setting out of windows, door locations, width of rotunda plant enclosure, rooflights, and membrane to roof covering of mansards
Condition 3 - wording changed to require discharge of solid brick work materials details solely (all other materials submitted under this S73 application)
Condition 5 - wording changed from details to compliance condition
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Approved under original consent ref P2019/0550/FUL:
Planning Statement LJW/KAH/SAV/J10403 dated 14/02/2019; Plant Noise Assessment 8437.RP03.PNA.2 Rev 2 dated 04/02/2019; Transport Statement inc. Draft Servicing Management Plan 107314-01; Sustainable Design and Construction Statement 26223-HM-CH-XX-RP-SU-0001; Archaeological Desk-Based Assessment; Schedule of Areas ST-PR[90]200 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-098 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-099 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-100 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-101 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-102 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-103 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-107 Rev P1; ST-PR-02-109 Rev P1; ST-PR-68-210 Rev 3A;  ST-PR-68-211 Rev 3A; ST-PR-68-212 Rev 3A; ST-PR-68-213 Rev 3A; ST-PR-95-300 Rev 3A; 26223-HM-CH-B1-DR-ES-0201 Rev 00; 26223-HM-CH-07-DR-ES-0201 Rev 00; 26223-HM-CH-07-DR-MS-0201 Rev 00;  26223-HM-CH-08-DR-ES-0201 Rev 00; 26223-HM-CH-08-DR-MS-0201 Rev 00, and 26223-HM-CH-LG-DR-ES-0201 Rev.00; Demolition Phase Construction Environmental Management Plan dated April 2019 Rev 2 (including appendices 1, 2 and 3); and Drawing Numbers: ST-EX-01-001 Rev P1, ST-EX-01-002 Rev P1; Site Noise Risk Assessment dated 13th May 2019; City Gate House - Air Quality Dust Management Plan Appendix A - Air Quality Dusk Risk Assessment Rev:CD:432 City Gate House including additional info (Positions of Noise & Dust Monitoring Points at City Gate House); Non-conforming & Complaints Report produced by Cantillion; Certificate of membership Construction Logistics and Community Safety Champion).

Approved under this application:
Design & Access Statement 4390 dated 28/05/2019; Additional Information booklet 4390 dated 24/09/2019; Material details booklet 4390 dated 04/10/2019 including detailed drawings: ST-PR-31-210 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-211 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-212 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-213 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-214 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-215 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-216 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-222 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-300 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-301 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-302 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-303 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-400 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-401 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-402 Rev P1, ST-PR-31-403 Rev P1, and ST-PR-31-405 Rev P1; and drawing numbers: ST-PR-02-104 Rev P2; ST-PR-02-105 Rev P2; ST-PR-02-106 Rev P2; ST-PR-02-108 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-101 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-102 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-103 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-104 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-108 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-109 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-110 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-111 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-112 Rev P2; ST-PR-03-113 Rev P2; ST-PR-04-102 Rev P2; ST-PR-04-103 Rev P2; ST-PR-04-105 Rev P2; 26223-HM-CH-06-DR-MS-0201 Rev 01; and 26223-HM-CH-06-DR-ES-0201 Rev 01.Section 73 Site Lines and Secional drawings with different viewpoints (1&2)Drawing Nos:ST-EX-01-003 dated 13/11/2019; ST-EX-01-003 VER 2; ST-EX-01-003 VER 3; ST-PR-04-101 (Section B-B as proposed) dated 13/11/2019; ST-PR-04-201 (7th floor roof detail) dated 13/11/2019; ST-PR-04-101 VER 2 (Section B-B as proposed showing sitelines taken from viewpoint 1) dated 13/11/2019;ST-PR-04-201 VER 2 (7th floor roof detail showing sitelines taken from viewpoint 1) dated 13/11/2019; ST-PR-04-101 (Section B-B as proposed showing sitelines taken from viewpoint 1A);ST-PR-04-201 VER 3 (7th floor roof detail showing siteliens taken from viewpoint 1a) dated 13/11/2019


REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
